Title: Requires health insurance policies to include coverage of optional anesthesia for certain contraceptive and menstrual health procedures
Summary: Requires health insurance policies to include coverage of optional anesthesia for certain contraceptive and menstrual health procedures including, but not limited to, loop electrosurgical excision procedure, colposcopy, ablation, and intrauterine device insertion.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring health insurance policies to include coverage of optional anesthesia for certain contraceptive and menstrual health procedures
